## FloorNode class

Rounds down to the nearest integer

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class FloorNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns the largest integer value not greater than x. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
